title: Speed of ball when it reaches the ground

content.question: In Experiment 1, what is the speed of the ball the instant it makes contact with the ground?

choices.label: <math alttext="0 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="0.55 meter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.55</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.5 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mfrac><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
